title: Parahumans of the Wormverse
author: James Picone
description: Mod based on characters from JC McCrae's (Wildbow's) Parahumans universe.
credits: - JC McCrae/Wildbow, of course, who wrote Worm and Ward
- Bart KF, who has done a lot of the programming work and has contributed significantly to deck and card design
- Softman, PiconeN, AristoWan, and others for playtesting and deck design thoughts
- James Picone, some deck design, some project management, some programming
